title: Anti-Theft Screaming Backpack
description: An armable contraption that SCREAMS if someone picks it up.

title: "End Meeting" Buttons
description: Everyone gets a button. If enough people press theirs, the meeting ends via a very loud siren.

title: The Sisyph-inbox
description: Every time you delete an email, this Chrome extension sends you one back.

title: Touching Grass
description: Instead of going outside, turn your laptop off by touching this houseplant.

title: I tracked every running gag in Bojack Horseman
description: ...and mapped them onto an interactive timeline. And also a video.

title: Automated Ragequitting
description: A custom mechanism that closes the active tab if my BPM gets too high.

title: Wider Pringles Cans
description: Never get your hand stuck inside a Pringles Can again.

title: The Onion Test
description: A game that asks two questions: 'Was this headline written by the Onion?' and 'How sure are you?'
